questions.answer: So far, I haven't had the chance to work formally within a company. Consequently, I am actively seeking a part-time internship position, whether it be on-site or remote. If you're interested in having a conversation, please don't hesitate to get in touch with me. I'm looking forward to connecting with you!
I was born in Colombia, so I am a native Spanish speaker. Currently, I am studying English and I am at the B1 level with the goal of reaching C1 level soon.
If you are interested in getting in touch with me, you can find various ways to do so in the button at the top right corner.

questions.ask: Have you studied a professional career?
questions.answer: I have studied a technical degree in software analysis and development. I am currently studying a career in the same field.

questions.ask: What do you enjoy about being a developer?
questions.answer: As a developer, I have the ability to create valuable products, giving me the satisfaction of contributing to transforming society. I enjoy seeing progress and improvements in various aspects, whether it's my skills, a project I'm working on, or the quality of people's lives. All of this is something that being a developer provides me.

questions.ask: Have you worked as a freelancer?
questions.answer: No, I have not had experience working as a freelancer thus far. My focus has been on honing my skills through personal projects and learning in educational settings. I am eager to explore opportunities in both freelance projects and collaborative roles in the future.
